pr_title: GG-31148 Thread Pools incomprehensible metric description

timeline.message: GG-31148 Thread Pools incomprehensible metric description

timeline.bodyText:
Do we need to change the description? RejectedExecutionHandler is actually a java SE class. If you think the change is needed, then
Handler class name for reject_ed_ tasks.
timeline.author: vmalin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -143,7 +143,7 @@
      *
      * @return Class name of current rejection handler.
      */
-    @MXBeanDescription("Class name of current rejection handler.")
+    @MXBeanDescription("Handler class name for rejection tasks.")

timeline.message: GG-31148 Thread Pools incomprehensible metric description. Corrections after the code review

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe, it would be good to copy&paste javadoc for java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionHandler,
i.e. The class name of the handler for tasks that cannot be executed by the thread pool.
What do you think?
timeline.author: sk0x50
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -143,7 +143,7 @@
      *
      * @return Class name of current rejection handler.
      */
-    @MXBeanDescription("Class name of current rejection handler.")
+    @MXBeanDescription("Handler class name for rejected tasks.")

timeline.message: GG-31148 Thread Pools incomprehensible metric description. Corrections after the code review. Part 2

timeline.bodyText: Returns the class name of the handler for tasks that cannot be executed.
timeline.author: sk0x50

timeline.message: GG-31148 Thread Pools incomprehensible metric description. Corrections after the code review. Part 3
